MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CH62, CH64 and CH66 postcode areas of Neston, Hooton, Willaston and surrounding areas affecting properties in Benty Heath Lane, Beech Hey Lane, Field Hey Lane, Street Hey Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  1:53PM.  Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 4PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:35PM on 28th October 2020.
